# Changelog

## 5.3.0 (2025-12-04)
* Add init command to initialize existing projects ([MGNLCLI-411](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-411))
* Add plugin and CLI dependencies into devDependencies in project ([MGNLCLI-440](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-440))

## 5.2.0 (2025-10-03)
* Add watch mode to CLI ([MGNLCLI-380](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-380))
* Notify user about the corrupted config file ([MGNLCLI-420](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-420))
* Update dependencies ([MGNLCLI-436](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-436))
* Move plugin dependencies from peer in CLI ([MGNLCLI-439](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-439))

## 5.1.0 (2025-07-07)
* Pass a command argument from the CLI to a plugin ([MGNLCLI-343](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-343))
* Configure ESLint and prettier ([MGNLCLI-258](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-258))
* Add message with cli mail for feedback ([MGNLCLI-369](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-369))
* Add additional checks in update-plugins.js ([MGNLCLI-395](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-395))

## 5.0.2 (2024-03-17)
* Fix package.json ([MGNLCLI-367](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-367))

## 5.0.1 (2024-03-17)
* Implement tab completion for the CLI and the added plugins ([MGNLCLI-217](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-217))
* Add depcheck to husky ([MGNLCLI-289](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-289))
* Handle if plugins property isn't in config ([MGNLCLI-290](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-290))
* Investigate and fix test warnings related to unhandled SIGINT event listeners in cli tests ([MGNLCLI-300](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-300))
* Explore supporting both ESM and CommonJS in our packages ([MGNLCLI-313](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-313))
* Update repo and docs links on Magnolia CLI npm homepage (v5) ([MGNLCLI-317](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-317))
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))
* Incorrect import in tests ([MGNLCLI-328](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-328))
* Add .gitlab-ci.yml ([MGNLCLI-330](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-330))
* Investigate and fix failing tests ([MGNLCLI-331](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-331))

## 5.0.0 (2024-10-14)
* introduce `@magnolia/cli` package version 5
